scripts.dox:gh-pages: flecks dox docusaurus -r '@flecks/([^/]+)/(.*)=[@flecks/**$1**/$2](https://github.com/cha0s/flecks/tree/master/packages/$1/$2)' -r '\((.*):([0-9]+):[0-9]+\)=($1#L$2)' && cd website && DOCUSAURUS_GENERATED_FILES_DIR_NAME=node_modules/.cache/docusaurus node_modules/.bin/docusaurus build --out-dir ../dox-tmp && cd .. && rm -rf dox/* && mv dox-tmp/* dox && rmdir dox-tmp
